name: A baby's mind
description:
Student project made by two belgian student from ESA St Luc for an exam, in june 2015 (yes it's a bit old). 

Available for Windows & mac but Oculus Rift mandatory !

The goal was to made a VR game without any input, we were authorized to use the player' sight and nothing else.

Since it was hard to make a character move (without putting the carachter on predetermined track, classic but not very fun) we came with the idea of a baby simulator. At the very start a baby doesn't really move by itself neither he can interact with his environnement. he can only see and dream.

From there it was just fun time imagining what would the baby could dream of.

Go give a try, we hope it will make you laugh !

---  CREDITS ---

Modelisation : Alexandre Leroy

Programmation : Yann Le Saint
